session.already_joined: Tried to create or join a session while already in one.
session.create_malformed: Received incomplete session data when trying to create a new session.
session.create_exists: Tried to create a session with a session ID that is already in use.
session.join_sid: Tried to join a session with an invalid session ID.
session.join_exists: Tried to join a session that does not exist.
session.session_write: Failed to write to the session database.
session.no_local_session: Failed to perform a session operation as the user is not in a session.
session.no_remote_session: Failed to perform a session operation as the database does not contain the session.
